::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod has a terrible thought. What if the Predicons new that the
Matrix of leadership was not in the hands of the Maximal elders.
What if the Preds new that the Matrix was within Hot Rod. That he was
truly Rodimus Prime. No. That could not happan. He has kept his name Hot
Rod and has not taken command in order to keep this secret.
